text: this is the this is the best job I've
ever had um I worked on the first three
seasons of friends as a writer and this
is the most fun I've ever had um the the
thing that makes a show great even
though I'm a writer and I like to say
it's the writing it's really the cast um
because I've seen a lot of shows with
really good writing and they didn't have
the cast and it doesn't work the same
way everyone is so strong comedically
it's there's no weak link that you're
trying to get to keep up everyone is so
funny in their own way and when when the
when they they they take the material to
an incredible new level that you never
even imagined when you you thought it
was funny when you were writing it and
what they do with it is incredible um
and it's just all Pros it's like an
All-Star Comedy team it's really a
pleasure we want
